entry.title: Current Conditions: 13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 5:30 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 20 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016
